summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the behavior of the Partial DSL components, including handling of whitespace, asynchronous operations, summary extraction, and nested union types. It also provides a simple asynchronous generator helper used within the tests.
business_intent: Ensure that the Partial DSL correctly processes partial literals, manages whitespace, supports asynchronous execution, extracts summaries, and handles complex union structures, thereby guaranteeing reliable integration with OpenAI and Pydantic models.
